sections.heading: party, defined.Political party shall mean a political party which has a right under law to have the names of its candidates listed on the ballot in a general election

sections.text:
49-1440.Political party, defined.

Political party shall mean a political party which has a right under law to have the names of its candidates listed on the ballot in a general election.

SourceLaws 1976, LB 987, ยง 40.
